name: The Skeleton Keys 2
description:
Mischievous ghosts are playing tricks on the Spooky Town residents. They have stolen two keys from Mr. Bones, the Haunted House Keykeeper, and seven stars from Mr. Orc.

Mr. Orc found the two keys and has agreed to give them to Mr. Bones if he collects all the missing stars.

During each level, Mr. Bones will be given a quest by the Orc to collect all stars in exchange for a key. Three stars are hidden in both Levels 1 and 2. Once the key is collected from Mr. Orc, the player must head towards the Haunted House to trigger another level. After the key is collected, the house will remain invisible until the player moves over its location.

*hint: the red ghost likes to guard the house 

The ghosts hid Mr. Orc’s last star in the Haunted House. To win the game, the player must collect the 7th star in Level 3.

The player begins with 3 lives at the beginning of each level; if the player runs into a ghost they will lose one life.

Speak to the residents of Spooky town along the way. 

Use the arrow keys to move Mr. Bones!
